employees.notes: Proff lists 206 employees on the company page.[1]

revenue.notes: Proff reports operating revenue as 462 342 with "Beløp i 1000", converted to NOK 462,342,000.[1]

company.entity_resolution_notes: Entity resolved as the Norwegian AS listed on Proff with legal name NORDISK FJELLSIKRING AS and org nr 893 517 952, matching the company website org number.[1][2]

srm_assessment.overall_summary: Available Norwegian company sources describe construction/rockfall services and an oil substitution measure, but do not disclose use of recycled, recovered, or waste-derived inbound input materials, fuels, or feedstocks.[1][2]
gaps_and_uncertainties: No annual report/ESG document with input-material composition or SRM volumes was identified in the reviewed sources.[1][2]
The sustainability page mentions switching to rapeseed oil, but provides no evidence that this is waste-derived or recycled input.[2]

evidence.evidence_snippet: Juridisk navn NORDISK FJELLSIKRING AS Org nr 893 517 952
evidence.claim: Confirms legal entity name and organization number.

evidence.evidence_snippet: 42.990 Bygging av andre anlegg ikke nevnt annet sted
43.990 Annen spesialisert bygge- og anleggsvirksomhet ikke nevnt annet sted

evidence.claim: Indicates financial figures are stated in thousands NOK.
Describes company activity as construction services.

evidence.evidence_snippet: Vi har gått bort fra å bruke petrokjemisk formolje og borolje til å bruke rapsolje på håndholdt utstyr og betongutstyr på sommerstid.
evidence.claim: Shows an oil-use change, not explicit SRM input disclosure.

sources.title: Nordisk Fjellsikring AS - Org.nr. 893 517 952 - Svarstad - Se Regnskap, Roller og mer
